getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).code: function getBorrowRate(uint256 cash, uint256 borrows, uint256 reserves) external view returns (uint256, uint256)

cash.description: The amount of cash in the market

borrows.description: The amount of borrows in the market

reserves.description: The amount of reserves in the market

getBorrowRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the current borrow rate per block, with the error code expected by the market

getSupplyRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.code: function getSupplyRate(uint256 cash, uint256 borrows, uint256 reserves, uint256 reserveFactorMantissa) external view returns (uint256)

cash.description: The amount of cash in the market

borrows.description: The amount of borrows in the market

reserves.description: The amount of reserves in the market

reserveFactorMantissa.description: The current reserve factor for the market

getSupplyRate(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Calculates the current supply rate per block

updateJumpRateModel(uint256,uint256,uint.code: function updateJumpRateModel(uint256 baseRatePerYear, uint256 multiplierPerYear, uint256 jumpMultiplierPerYear, uint256 kink_) external nonpayable

baseRatePerYear.description: The approximate target base APR, as a mantissa (scaled by 1e18)

multiplierPerYear.description: The rate of increase in interest rate wrt utilization (scaled by 1e18)

jumpMultiplierPerYear.description: The multiplierPerBlock after hitting a specified utilization point

kink_.description: The utilization point at which the jump multiplier is applied

updateJumpRateModel(uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Update the parameters of the interest rate model (only callable by owner, i.e. Timelock)

utilizationRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).code: function utilizationRate(uint256 cash, uint256 borrows, uint256 reserves) external pure returns (uint256)

cash.description: The amount of cash in the market

borrows.description: The amount of borrows in the market

reserves.description: The amount of reserves in the market (currently unused)

utilizationRate(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the utilization rate of the market: `borrows / (cash + borrows - reserves)`

NewInterestParams.code: event NewInterestParams(uint256 baseRatePerBlock, uint256 multiplierPerBlock, uint256 jumpMultiplierPerBlock, uint256 kink)

title: Compound's JumpRateModel Contract V2 for legacy cTokens
author: Arr00
name: LegacyJumpRateModelV2
